titles.title: To amend title XX of the Social Security Act to repeal the program of block grants to States for social services, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 9/19/2012--Introduced. Repeals the program of block grants to states for social services under title XX (Block Grants to States for Social Services) of the Social Security Act.
